data.message: The Deposit Return Scheme, which you're currently opposing in the UK, would be Beautiful.  You could even run a huge marketing campaign saying how you've listened and changed direction to support the environment, instead of lobbying hard against it.  Please reconsider your position.

replies.message:
Absolutely - I don't know how this colossal company can not just shrug but oppose a duty it should have to have! You make it you clean it up. 
Not going to buy your products on principal until you change yours
